tool_description: Now supports multiple languages. Get your text paraphrased, in a matter of seconds.
name: Paraphraser
title: Paraphraser

api_list.name: Paraphraser V2
api_list.description: Now you can added source language to get more accurate results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paraphraser2.p.rapidapi.com/v2/generate/text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paraphraser2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
